entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
